description: '''Deeds of Flesh''' is an American [[brutal death metal]] band from [[Los Osos, California|Los Osos]], California, U.S. They were formed in 1993 by Jacoby Kingston, Erik Lindmark (1972â€“2018) and Joey Heaslet.  They founded their own label, Unique Leader Records, which has since become home to a number of other [[death metal]] bands from around the world.  Deeds of Flesh have released nine studio albums, their most recent being ''[[Nucleus (Deeds of Flesh album)|Nucleus]]'' which was released in 2020.
